title: Mastering Mathematical Induction: Simulation Learning Based on Quasi-Inductive Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic logical expressions and proof structures, with experience in first-order predicate logic
context.additional_context: Strengthening the application of mathematical proof tools for solving social science problems

learning_goals: Learners can explain the logical flow of inductive reasoning steps with 80% accuracy through quasi-inductive tasks.
Learners successfully complete three-step mathematical induction proofs in VR environments over three times.
Learners identify the difference between inductive hypothesis and goal statement with 90% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
